title: data-transport-layer Caught an unhandled error
body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
l2geth log

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
use this .env file

COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=op-replica
COMPOSE_FILE=replica.yml:replica-shared.yml:replica-toml.yml
ETH_NETWORK=mainnet
DATA_TRANSPORT_LAYER__L1_RPC_ENDPOINT=https://eth-mainnet.alchemyapi.io/v2/redacted
DATA_TRANSPORT_LAYER__L2_RPC_ENDPOINT=https://opt-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/redacted
REPLICA_HEALTHCHECK__ETH_NETWORK_RPC_PROVIDER=https://opt-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/redacted
SEQUENCER_CLIENT_HTTP=https://opt-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/redacted
SHARED_ENV_PATH=../envs/mainnet
GCMODE=full
L2GETH_IMAGE_TAG=latest
DTL_IMAGE_TAG=latest
HC_IMAGE_TAG=latest
L2GETH_HTTP_PORT=9991
L2GETH_WS_PORT=9992
DTL_PORT=7878
GETH_INIT_SCRIPT=check-for-chaindata-berlin.sh
USING_OVM=true
RESTART=unless-stopped

then docker compose up -d

**Expected behavior**
it should start sync blocks(just like three day ago)

**Screenshots**
no

**System Specs:**
 - OS:debian10 with docker 20.10.16(go version: go1.17.10)
 - Package Version (or commit hash):latest

**Additional context**
if i use blockvision or mainnet.optimism.io as rpc ,it works, but if i use alchemy it just stop working,and it was working 36 hours ago.

update # 1: when i change DATA_TRANSPORT_LAYER__L1_RPC_ENDPOINT to blockvision,it works,no matter what L2 rpc it use.maybe it is L1 rpc issue
update # 2: not working again even use blockvision
update # 3:working if i use blockvision both L1 and L2

This issue is related to alchemy, they don't support eth_getBlockRange method.
[
![Screen Shot 2022-06-23 at 4 07 09 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/65017949/175249248-be91ae4d-14f2-4189-8313-637b1d652543.png)
](url)

I've to switch both L1, L2 url to blockvision too.
